Row.Text: Ancient Era unit with low range and can melee attack, can move after attacking.
Due to the unit's short range, high mobility and ability to disengage, it can provide good support for your units in battle. Its better to use this unit to defend your lands early from naval attacks.

The Quinquereme, originally a unit built by the Carthage and Roman Empires in the 4th Century BC, was a large ored vessel capable of housing a large number of units including archers and swordsmen. Wiki link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hellenistic-era_warships#Quinquereme
